original_title: Sri Lanka bonds open down, rupee 322.00/324.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds opened down, dealers said while the spot US dollar opened unchanged at 322.00/324.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted steady at 15.30 percent after closing at 15.10/30 percent on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 was quoted down at 15.10/30 percent after closing at 15.25/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted down at 13.10/40 percent after closing at 13.25/45 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 and 01.07.2025 have not been quoted. (Colombo/July14/2023)
